title: Pokémon Adventures (7 Volume Set - Reads R to L
description: Capture the excitement of Pokémon Adventures!All your favorite Pokémon game characters jump out of the screen into the pages of this action-packed manga!Contains Pokémon Adventures vols. 1-7 and a color poster!Capture the excitement of Pokémon Adventures with Volumes 1–7 of the series and a collectible poster in a box set.
author: Hidenori Kusaka
